metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1507 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: chafa: NULL Pointer Dereference in function gif_internal_decode_frame atlibnsgif.c:599 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via acrafted input file. in GitHub repository hpjansson/chafa prior to 1.10.2.chafa: NULL Pointer Dereference in function gif_internal_decode_frame atlibnsgif.c:599 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via acrafted input file.

criterions.comment: chafa package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
